## ‚ùå CRITICAL ITEMS REMAINING

### 8. ‚ùå Apple Developer Account - REQUIRED
- [ ] **Status**: Unknown - Do you have this?
- **Cost**: $99/year
- **Sign up**: https://developer.apple.com/programs/
- **Required for**:
  - Uploading to App Store Connect
  - TestFlight distribution
  - Code signing
  - App Store submission
- **Timeline**: 10 minutes to sign up, 24-48 hours for approval
- **Action**: Sign up at developer.apple.com if you haven't

### 9. ‚ùå App Store Screenshots - REQUIRED
- [ ] **Status**: Not yet created
- **Required sizes** (minimum):
  - iPhone 6.7" (1290 x 2796) - 3-10 screenshots
  - iPad 12.9" (2048 x 2732) - 3-10 screenshots
- **What to show**:
  - Main calculator interface with example
  - Tax breakdown view
  - Different salary amounts
  - Tax rates display
  - ISR bracket information
- **Timeline**: 1-2 hours
- **Action**: Take screenshots in Xcode simulators
- **Guide**: See below for quick instructions

### 10. ‚ùå Privacy Policy - RECOMMENDED
- [ ] **Status**: Template created, not published
- **Required**: If app collects ANY data
- **This app**: Collects NO data (all local)
- **Still recommended**: Apple may ask for it
- **Where to host**:
  - GitHub Pages (free)
  - Personal website
  - Notion page (public)
- **Timeline**: 30 minutes
- **Action**: Use template in APP_STORE_CHECKLIST.md

### 11. ‚ùå App Store Metadata - REQUIRED
- [ ] **Status**: Not yet written
- **What's needed**:
  - App name (max 30 chars)
  - Subtitle (max 30 chars)
  - Description (4000 chars max)
  - Keywords (100 chars, comma-separated)
  - Category (Primary: Finance, Secondary: Productivity)
  - Age rating (4+)

  - Marketing URL (optional)
- **Timeline**: 1-2 hours
- **Action**: Draft these in a document

## ‚è±Ô∏è Time to Submission

### Fast Track (Minimum Requirements)
**Estimated Time**: 4-6 hours of work + 1-3 days Apple review

1. **Apple Developer Account** - 10 mins to sign up
2. **Screenshots** - 1-2 hours
3. **Privacy Policy** - 30 mins (use template)
4. **App Store Metadata** - 1-2 hours
5. **Upload to App Store Connect** - 30 mins
6. **Apple Review** - 1-3 days (wait time)

**Total**: ~5 hours work + review wait time

### Professional Track (Recommended)
**Estimated Time**: 1-2 weeks

Includes:
- Professional screenshots with overlays
- Marketing website
- App preview video
- Beta testing with TestFlight
- Press kit
- Social media presence

## üöÄ Recommended Next Steps

### STEP 1: Apple Developer Account (If you don't have it)
**Priority**: CRITICAL
**Time**: 10 minutes + 24-48 hour wait

1. Go to https://developer.apple.com/programs/
2. Click "Enroll"
3. Sign in with Apple ID
4. Choose Individual or Organization
5. Complete enrollment ($99/year)
6. Wait for approval (usually 24-48 hours)

### STEP 2: Take Screenshots
**Priority**: HIGH
**Time**: 1-2 hours

See quick guide below.

### STEP 3: Create Privacy Policy
**Priority**: MEDIUM (but recommended)
**Time**: 30 minutes

Use template from APP_STORE_CHECKLIST.md

### STEP 4: Write App Store Metadata
**Priority**: HIGH
**Time**: 1-2 hours

Draft in a document first, then paste into App Store Connect.

## üì∏ Quick Screenshot Guide

### How to Take Screenshots

1. **Open Xcode project**
2. **Select device simulators**:
   - iPhone 15 Pro Max (6.7")
   - iPad Pro 12.9"

3. **Run app** (‚åò + R)

4. **Enter example data**:
   - Example 1: $50,000 monthly
   - Example 2: $20,000 monthly
   - Example 3: $100,000 monthly

5. **Take screenshots** (‚åò + S in Simulator)

6. **Locate screenshots**:
   - Desktop folder
   - Or: Simulator ‚Üí File ‚Üí Save Screen

7. **Need at least**:
   - 3 screenshots per device type
   - Show different features/scenarios

### What to Capture

Screenshot 1: Main calculator with $50,000 example
- Shows input field, results, tax breakdown

Screenshot 2: Tax rates and bracket info
- Scroll to show rates section

Screenshot 3: Different salary ($20,000)
- Shows how app works for different amounts

Screenshot 4: Bi-weekly period selected
- Shows multiple pay period support

Screenshot 5: Large salary ($100,000)
- Shows app handles big numbers

## üìù App Store Metadata Template

### App Name (30 chars max)
```
Mexico Tax Calculator
```
OR
```
Calculadora ISR M√©xico
```

### Subtitle (30 chars max)
```
ISR & IMSS Calculator 2026
```
OR
```
Calculadora ISR e IMSS 2026
```

### Description (Draft)
```
Calculate your Mexican taxes (ISR and IMSS) instantly with the most accurate
2026 tax calculator for Mexico.

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Official 2026 ISR tax brackets from SAT
‚Ä¢ IMSS social security contributions
‚Ä¢ Multiple pay periods (monthly, bi-weekly, weekly, annual)
‚Ä¢ Real-time calculations as you type
‚Ä¢ Tax rate analysis (average & marginal)
‚Ä¢ ISR bracket information
‚Ä¢ Beautiful iPad-optimized interface
‚Ä¢ Completely free, no ads, no data collection

ACCURATE CALCULATIONS:
Based on official 2026 tax regulations:
- SAT Anexo 8 de la Resoluci√≥n Miscel√°nea Fiscal 2026
- Official IMSS employee contribution rates
- Current UMA values

TAX BREAKDOWN:
‚Ä¢ Net salary after deductions
‚Ä¢ ISR (Income Tax) calculation
‚Ä¢ IMSS (Social Security) contributions
‚Ä¢ Total deductions
‚Ä¢ Average tax rate percentage
‚Ä¢ Marginal tax rate percentage
‚Ä¢ Your current tax bracket

PRIVACY:
No data collection. All calculations are performed locally on your device.
No internet connection required. No sign-up needed.

DISCLAIMER:
This calculator provides estimates based on 2026 ISR tax brackets and IMSS
rates. Calculations are for informational purposes only. For official tax
calculations, consult with a certified tax professional or SAT.

Perfect for employees, contractors, and anyone who needs to quickly calculate
their Mexican tax obligations.
```

### Keywords (100 chars max)
```
ISR,IMSS,impuestos,tax,calculator,calculadora,salario,salary,SAT,Mexico,nomina,payroll
```

### Categories
- Primary: **Finance**
- Secondary: **Productivity**

### Age Rating
